attributes.action: stop saving children - too many of them with respect to Malthus - let them die
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Migration
Coming through the groin
In exponential surges
Loins
Are girded for the battle
Where one man says 'make love not war'
Another sees the offspring coming
As before
To assert a call over the planetary bounty
For nothing
But their petty evolutionary county
Just speck in a pixel
From so 'far out'
There is nothing betwixt them
Failing to doubt
And so the rape of land and man
Is upholden as some godly plan
Delusions, fraud, belief and breeding
Forgetting ourselves as nothing but stars seeding
An element so heavy
Metallic rain falls
And the doom to avoid
Remains
All that bafalls

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
